sentence.Network_en: Achilles was a great Greek warrior and son of the sea nymph Thetis.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿基里斯为一名伟大的希腊战士,是海仙女特蒂斯之子.

sentence.Network_en: When Achilles was born, Thetis learned that her son would die in combat.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿基里斯出生时, 特蒂斯得知她的儿子会战死沙场.
